question: In geometry, a hexagon has 7 sides.
The sum of the angles in a triangle is always 180 degrees.
An obtuse angle is greater than 90 degrees.
A prime number is divisible by 1 and itself only.
The area of a rectangle is equal to the product of its length and width.
The equation 2x + 5 = 10 has a solution x = 2.
The circumference of a circle is π times its diameter.
